job_description: senior administrative assistants help senior managers and high-level executives maximize their efficiency by providing them with clerical and secretarial support. they keep these managers and executives organized by taking care of their travel arrangements, scheduling their meetings and other tasks that will be discussed in this article. when it comes to work environment, senior administrative assistants spend the day in a standard office environment. pretty much every industry employs senior administrative assistants, but they are mostly found at midsize and large corporations that have several senior managers and executives on staff.   the role of senior administrative assistant is not an entry-level position. usually, one must have 3-5 years experience as an administrative assistant before getting a senior position. success in this role depends on the level of trust between assistant and executive, which requires a sense of loyalty. in this sense, the relationship between assistant and executive is slightly different than your standard employee-boss relationship. according to the national bureau of labor statistics, demand for executive administrative assistants and executive secretaries, which includes senior administrative assistants, is set to decline 5 percent through 2026.   our team of certified resume writers have created a library ofresume examplesto show you how to craft a strong resume. study them to learn to write your own.     boost your resume with an extra click. ourcover letter templatesmatch our resume templates designs for a cohesive application. use a template in our builder to help you quantify and expand upon the experience from your resume and impress employers.   this job is provided by shine.com          desired skills and experience         "document control", "hospital marketing", nursing, "administration management", "healthcare management", "staff administration", "diary management", "healthcare commissioning", "hospital administration", "healthcare improvement"

job_description: airbnb was born in 2007 when two hosts welcomed three guests to their san francisco home, and has since grown to over 4 million hosts who have welcomed more than 1 billion guest arrivals in almost every country across the globe. every day, hosts offer unique stays and experiences that make it possible for guests to connect with communities in a more authentic way.     the community you will join    airbnb capability center was set up in 2017 in gurgaon to service the global airbnb community. we provide specialised operational services which allow airbnb's business and responsibilities across the world. these include finance, technology, finance shared services, analytics, engineering amongst other products.   our offices are home to multi-accomplished teams with an understanding of our business and community. we are hospitable, fun and we welcome all with open arms.     the difference you will make    finance capability center-the revenue operations senior accountant will be responsible for accounting, reconciliation and reporting of chargeback, escheatment and other processes related to platform controllership.   you will understand gaap and revenue recognition principles, and the ability to partner across departments.     a typical day      as an important member of a team, prepare and process month-end journals, perform month end closing and reporting activities; manage partners communications for any exceptions, deviations issue resolutions  support transitions and knowledge transfer, monitoring important deliverables.  perform variance/ flux commentary on p/l and bs accounts.  responsible for reconciliation preparation following internal/external accounting guidelines and sox requirements from group level.  collaborate with partners, including accounting authorities/auditors. manage relationships with multiple partners with the objective of meeting delivery following the agreed parameters.  be a subject matter expert for related processes.  initiate and participate in improvements to sustain an organised process, and work on areas to standardise processes to improve investments made in global erp systems and financial services.  support the measurement and delivery of service levels and service level agreement/key performance indicator targets.  ensure adherence to sox controls and compliance procedures.  support in building backup and cross training plans and ensure they are implemented and revisited.  manage operational delivery of all the internal and external audit requests within the timelines, managing the clear expectations of partners. raising any blockers       your expertise      accounting graduate / mba finance / semi-qualified ca with relevant prior financial experience of 8+ years. experience of people management would be an added advantage  understanding of revenue recognition - asc606, revenue accounting and general ledger processes. knowledge of gaap reporting demonstrated in a multinational, matrix organisation  champion the mission to help teams understand how their work contributes to end goals. - embrace the adventure with peers and teams using creative channels of communication to keep teams updated with daily changes in goals that are relevant to their roles.  work with a diverse team and impart knowledge across teams. handling multiple revenue platform accounting projects  facilitation and collaboration skills to gather, document, and understand requirements obtained from multiple personalities across organisational boundaries.  willing to undertake several challenging tasks.  lead to monitor multiple client deliverables, without sacrificing excellence or quality.  analytical, with specific experience managing financial information. knowledge of performance calculations and investment reporting.  systems experience: workday, oracle, or other large erp system       our commitment to inclusion & belonging    airbnb is committed to working with the broadest talent pool possible. we believe diverse ideas foster innovation and engagement, and allow us to attract creatively-led people, and to develop the best products, services and solutions. all qualified individuals are encouraged to apply.

job_description: java se is the most common platform for enterprise systems and isv applications today. oracle java se subscription and oracle java se desktop subscription are oracle's solutions for enterprise developers and isvs running mission-critical applications and infrastructure on the java se platform.  java platform, standard edition (java se) lets enterprises develop and deploy java applications on desktops and servers. java offers the rich user interface, performance, versatility, portability, and security that today's applications require.      what you will do:     the customer success team is designed to be the primary team following up on high-run-rate java se subscription renewal transactions focused on the na market. this role involves writing formal email correspondence and following up with java sales customers for the express purpose of renewing java se subscription contracts. this role is a sales support role to the customer success team and involves very high volumes of correspondence and follow-up.     this team is responsible for understanding and orchestrating oracle's java se subscription renewal workflow, follow-up, and deal processes, as well as being the direct link between our volume java se subscription customers and the customer success team. this team is an extremely valuable asset to the customer success organization to ensure clear and concise communication notifying renewal prospects of renewal dates, pricing, contracts, and bookings.      what you will do:     with relevant knowledge of customer relationship management, the customer success representative supports commercial management activities to ensure the timely renewal of oracle maintenance contracts with existing customers for the north american region. the renewal representative should be able to educate and deftly guide customers throughout the process, thereby delivering an excellent customer experience while effectively executing renewal plans. the candidate is expected to have strong technical skills with essential skills such as negotiation, influence, strategic planning, and organizational awareness to execute and deliver the desired goals. working in partnership with multiple lobs, the candidate is expected to provide professional support and help in optimizing renewal revenue.      follow up by email and phone on java se subscription renewal contracts for the  usa market (requires working in night shift).  for direct deals: create opportunity ids, create budgetary quotes, and book renewal deals.  update forecasts and communicate status as needed to java sales management.  work with java sales channel support team for entering and booking indirect deals.  achieve quarterly assigned sales quotas.  the customer success representative is responsible for actively engaging clients in pursuit of continued renewal of java se subscriptions.  build relationships and negotiate with existing customers, being the â€œgo-toâ€ account manager for customers and partners.  ensure the accuracy and timely submission of licenses/maintenance renewal quotes within assigned territory.  take an account management approach to identify co-termination and reinstatement opportunities.  demonstrates the ability to personally plan for the achievement of performance goals and exceed quota for the assigned territory.  maintain accurate forecasts and activities for assigned regions in the crm.  leverage cross-functional resources to achieve results/meet customer needs.  handle escalations, provide appropriate solutions and alternatives within the time limits and follow up to ensure resolution.

job_description: job description essential responsibilities         job description summary as part of the ge india multi-modal loco team, the jr. engineer (winder), is responsible for winding of motor and alternator. you shall also be responsible for safety, quality, process tryouts and developments, continual improvement projects, kaizen, 5s, lean principles. you shall be responsible to perform the job per set standards and procedures and to implement the qms procedures, policies.     knowledge of industry safety practices.  ability to read and understand drawing and specifications.  ability to use variety of tools and equipment.  responsible for self-inspection as per the drawing/standard requirements.  responsible for production as per production plan.  responsible for winding of motor and alternator.  ability to learn and work on various digital tools.  ability to use heavy machinery, such as maini, cranes etc.  must comply to all ehs requirements & actively support ehs programs in the plant set standards.  perform coil insertion, electrical connections per winding diagrams.  braze either by torch, carbon or induction.  ability to handle job and perform impregnation cycles.  handle, measure and mix chemicals in accordance with prescribed methods and operating requirements.  maintaining healthy working atmosphere by 5s tools.    qualifications/requirements:     highest levels of personal integrity and safety mindset.  first class diploma in mechanical/electrical.  2 to 3 years of experience in engineering/manufacturing industry.    desired characteristics:     ability to analyze problems, identify root causes and provide efficient solutions.  strong organizational skills, ms office skills.  ability to handle diverse activities simultaneously.  strong interpersonal and leadership skills with good oral and written communication skills (english, hindi, marathi).  team player knowledge of 5s, lean and six sigma methodology.       additional information     relocation assistance provided: no

job_description: job specification -       position:  deputy general manager - ehs  location : jaipur  qualification : b. tech + advance diploma in industrial safety & environment  experience : 12 to 15 years of industry experience  industry : preferably from construction equipment / heavy earth moving / automobile / auto components.  key competencies : communication & leadership skill, proactive approach  experience in handling ehs & legal compliance of manufacturing & heavy fabrication       job description        to provide site safety leadership, ensure facility compliance with corporate safety standards, implement safety directives, improve safety performance, and ensure facility safety policies and procedures are aligned with governmental regulations.  position will provide full time environmental health and safety support to the operations and will ensure that all practices are in compliance with regulatory requirements.  position will be responsible for coordinating regulatory programs and its permitting applications. support the development and coordination of training programs in support of our training goals  practice safe working techniques and re-enforce the safety policies, guidelines, and procedures as set out by the company.  provide daily guidance and direction in ehs programs at the employee / supervisor level to ensure an effective approach  responsible for assisting in the identification of the risk in various works  coordinate and support for iso certification (14001 and 45000) related work, its compliance and adherence for half yearly audits  conduct weekly and monthly safety meetings in accordance with global jcb requirements and maintain the records.  ensure maintaining ehs up to date records with respect to safety parameters and maintain all reporting formats and procedures as per global jcb ehs requirements  ensure that contractor personnel working on the property are in compliance with jcb policies and safety requirements.  provide advice, assist, and audit line management to ensure that effective ehs is implemented and working.  perform and contribute to the site training plans by conducting employee orientations; emergency training; and coordination of modular training programs for the operation.  ensure inspections by regulatory agencies are coordinated and deficiencies minimized and corrected.  maintain all logs and documentation associated with permits and regulatory requirements  assist with maintaining the site preparedness and emergency plans & procedures.  responsible for coordinating regulatory programs and its applications and help support the compliance  supporting and providing relief for the environmental department.  accountable for researching and writing permit applications and work with environmental group and be compliant in completing permit reporting requirements.  maintain filing systems regarding ims, regulatory works and worker training and safety  maintain working relationships with regulatory agencies such as pollution control board, factory and boilers dept., fire department, explosives dept, labor dept etc. and chair or co- chair and lead the safety committee and its meetings for the operation.   Â· perform safety audits and inspect facilities, machinery, and safety equipment to identify and correct potential hazards, and to ensure safety regulation compliance   Â· investigate industrial accidents, near-miss incidents, and occupational injuries to determine causes, install preventive measures, and manage return-to-work activities   Â· provide technical advice, coaching, guidance, and mentoring to employees on safety initiatives and necessary changes   Â· coordinate employee safety programs to determine their adequacy including review of short and long term strategic safety planning and development        competencies:    team player and able to build and maintain relationships both internal and external.  ability to build trust and confidence with management and supervision   ability to communicate with employees at all levels  thorough knowledge of applicable regulations (osha, iosh, ims )  flexible to change and open to constructive feedback.  strong written and verbal communication skills.  strong organizational and interpersonal skills.  able to work independently with minimal supervision.       other competencies:   Â· basic to intermediate proficiency with microsoft office applications   Â· read, write and communicate using english language sufficient to perform job functions   Â· sap knowledge for pr, po , service entry etc.

job_description: company description   you see things a little differently. so do we. we believe that what you value is more important than what your cv says. we offer positions that will challenge your skills and let you grow. come see things a little differently with us!   in south asia weâ€™re on an exciting journey of expanding our business by adding new suppliers & categories and strengthening our existing suppliers. if you like challenges and really making a difference, maybe this journey is for you!    purpose of the function :   the task of ikea components within ikea is to pursue the development of future unique and customer-friendly solutions within fittings and components to the ikea range. we create substantial cost and quality benefits for ikea in our development and trade of raw materials, components and fittings. ikea components is part of the ikea group and shares the ikea vision and values. our business is global and employs 1300 people based in sweden, slovakia and china. through co-operation with ikea purchasing offices, we are also represented at several other sites around the world.    purpose of the role :   as a production engineer, you will secure and support the engineering and quality agenda with the overall goal to improve the customer satisfaction. furthermore, you will be the main contact towards the suppliers for engineering and quality topics. as part of the business team, you will work with suppliers to: develop and secure the production process, handle quality deviations and secure compliance to all ikea requirements.   the production engineer in ikea components is the main contact towards the suppliers for quality & engineering and works as part of a business team to develop and secure production process, handling quality deviations and securing compliance to all ikea requirements.    job description     secure quality assurance including supporting for implementing process control for key processes in production  perform product audits and production risk assessments at supplier  lead the running range at the suppliers and sub-suppliers to secure full compliance of ikea requirements  lead the supplier development for quality and manufacturing with responsibility to identify and implement actions and execution of supplier development process projects  lead product deviation processes, securing root-cause analysis and implementation of corrective/preventive actions  secure implementation of new and update requirements  secure final inspection and regular follow up and feedback to the suppliers regarding quality performance       why we will love you   we believe that you are a person with analytical skills, you have an interest in understanding production and continues improvements. we also see that you have high energy and are self-driven. furthermore, you have an interest and drive to build trust and partnerships to reach common goals.   as a production engineer we believe that you have good knowledge of production processes and technologies. you have the ability to evaluate our supplierâ€™s technical capability and quality performance so that they can produce ikea products. furthermore you have knowledge within democratic design and customer needs. preferable you have experience from steel components and materials.    qualifications     you have experience of at least 5 years in production environment.   you have technical/engineering background.   you have a good knowledge of lean manufacturing & six sigma methods and tools.   you are familiar with quality systems and total quality management.   you have the energy to improve things (proven record of implementing process / product improvements)  very good computer software skills (ms office applications)  you have the energy to improve things (proven record of implementing process / product improvements)  you have ability to solve problems, take decisions and navigate through complex technical issues with a holistic view  fluency in english, both written and verbal.      additional information    sound interesting?   please send us your application â€“  cv and letter of motivation â€“ in english. we really want to get to know you, so make sure you tell us why you would be a good fit for this role by applying for this position not later than 21st february 2023.   in case of any questions regarding the role, please connect with hiring manager, hang ngu thi diem and people & culture generalist , jaswinder sharma for any questions related to recruitment process.   kindly note that we will be interviewing continuously, which means that we may close the application process earlier than stated if we find the right candidate. so, donâ€™t delay, please send us your application today. we look forward knowing you more.

410501    relocation assistance   no     role summary/purpose    as part of the ge india multi-modal drives and controls, the jr. engineer will be responsible for cabinet assembly , cabinet wiring and assemble electrical devices while they are supposed to maintain the health of tools & machinery. he may also perform tests on electrical items, such as cabinets and sub assemblies. junior engineer job_description: about client   the largest independent recordkeeping services partner, third-party administrator, and government and health savings facilitator in the united states. our client is also one of the savings plan industry's leading providers of outsourced services. they deliver high-quality solutions for every segment of the retirement plan marketplace. having their captive centre in india.    role brief   the head of human resources is primarily concerned with providing strategic advice, guidance and leadership across the organization on all aspects of the key risk areas of human resources. he/ she will be expected to lead the strategic development across the range of human resource areas working with all the business leaders, the key stakeholders and build solutions to enhance employee experience, provide talent advisory services to management while driving a meritocratic culture.    essential duties and responsibilities    develop and implement hr processes, procedures and best practices: will be required to develop & scale hr policies & systems best suited for a growth oriented organization. he/ she will strategize & align hr policies to business goals for enabling a performance driven culture.  function as a trusted advisor to business leaders, with the talent acquisition strategies across the organization. determine recruitment needs, market conditions, improving on existing processes , design & manage employer branding strategies, including d&i initiatives.  work with leaders to design & roll out talent management practices to nurture high talents.  identify and analyze organization effectiveness opportunities and recommend initiatives that address global and regional opportunities based on business strategy.  form collaborative relationships with business partners in order to execute talent strategies and efforts to support growth of the organization.  ensure an ongoing process to continuously enhance the knowledge and capability of key talent in order to enable these managers to effectively lead the organization toward achievement of strategic initiatives.   oversee the performance effectiveness program that focuses employee's efforts on the achievement of business goals and attainment of requisite skills/competencies to sustain profitable growth.  head the strategic compensation & benefits portfolio- align the compensation & benefits policies with the global c&b policies according to local regulations.  ensuring hr compliance in lieu with the legal- laws & regulations.  manage and maintain relationships in a growth oriented organizations- the individual should have the stature and credibility to command respect and acceptance and be able to deal with organizational complexity and matrixed structures (local & global) by being a strong influencer     desired skills & experience    post graduate in hr with 15+ years of experience.  7 or more years as a head of hr for a global mid sized company.  business and hr acumen, including strong problem solving skills, critical thinking, and analysis.  demonstrated strengths in communication management, business partnership and collaboration.  experience assessing management and executive level talent.  experience working in an environment of high innovation and ownership requiring strong multi-tasking abilities.    location: hyderabad

job_description: about us:   paytm is indiaâ€™s leading digital payments and financial services company, which is focused on driving consumers and merchants to its platform by offering them a variety of payment use cases. paytm provides consumers with services like utility payments and money transfers, while empowering them to pay via paytm payment instruments (ppi) like paytm wallet, paytm upi, paytm payments bank netbanking, paytm fastag and paytm postpaid - buy now, pay later. to merchants, paytm offers acquiring devices like soundbox, edc, qr and payment gateway where payment aggregation is done through ppi and also other banksâ€™ financial instruments. to further enhance merchantsâ€™ business, paytm offers merchants commerce services through advertising and paytm mini app store. operating on this platform leverage, the company then offers credit services such as merchant loans, personal loans and bnpl, sourced by its financial partners.   about the team: liaison between the creditors and consumers. they are in charge of observing accounts to identify overdue payments, report collection activity, address client queries, and develop repayment plans.   about the role: lead the collections target and control collection flow for specified area. handle large team of collection officers, their productivity and performance.   expectations/ requirements:      to achieve collection targets of the area assigned, control flow cases and focus on non starters   ensured documented feedback   ensure adequate feet on street availability/bucket wise /segment wise   manage productivity for fixing productivity parameters for collection officers agencies/in-house team   monitoring performance against set parameters and weekly review with collection executives   ensuring background check of all collection agencies hired/identify and manage training needs of the collection executives/ evaluation of performance of all ce   support collection officers in legal /police issues/collection activities      superpowers/ skills that will help you succeed in this role:      people management skills   more than 5 years of relevant experience in collections role   demonstrated success and achievement orientation   excellent communication skills   negotiations skills - strong bias for driving results in a high performance environment   strong relationship and leadership skills   working knowledge of computers      education: graduation/ post graduation preferred   why join us:      a collaborative output driven program that brings cohesiveness across businesses through technology   improve the average revenue per use by increasing the cross-sell opportunities   a solid 360-degree feedback from your peer teams on your support of their goals   respect, that is earned, not demanded from your peers and manager      compensation:   if you are the right fit, we believe in creating wealth for you   with enviable 500 mn+ registered users, 21 mn+ merchants and depth of data in our ecosystem, we are in a unique position to democratize credit for deserving consumers & merchants â€“ and we are committed to it. indiaâ€™s largest digital lending story is brewing here. itâ€™s your opportunity to be a part of the story!

job_description: about flipkart - the flipkart group is one of indiaâ€™s leading digital commerce entities and includes group companies flipkart, myntra, cleartrip, and others. started in 2007, flipkart has enabled millions of consumers, sellers, merchants and small businesses to be a part of indiaâ€™s e-commerce revolution. with a registered customer base of over 200 million, offering over 150 million products across 120+ categories. our efforts to democratize e-commerce in india, driving access and affordability, delight customers, create lakhs of jobs in the ecosystem and empower generations of entrepreneurs and msmes has driven us to innovate on many industry firsts. flipkart is known for pioneering customer-centric innovations that have made online shopping more accessible and affordable for millions of indians.   about the team - job_description: job description    as an interior designer, you should have excellent creative thinking skills and be able to create designs based on conversations with a client. you should be confident communicating regularly with clients in order to assess their needs and be able to adjust a given approach based on feedback. you should maintain familiarity with the interior design landscape and trends in order to provide the best idea for the client.     to own the sales funnel & drive sales closure  to own customer experience during a project  to lead and own quality & accuracy of design deliverables.  to own an end to end project lifecycle.     job requirement     graduation / relevant diploma | 15 years' of academic education.  minimum experience 3 yrs as an interior designer.  led and delivered minimum 5 to 6 residential projects.  holds excellent knowledge of design tools, ppt presentation, autocad.  holds design expertise in conceptual design (layout, style, moodboard)  technical design (material knowledge, execution and drawing preparation)  modular design (material knowledge, aesthetics & functionality, module planning)  civil works & services (specifications & installation details)  holds project expertise in creating boq for customers, coordinating with internal & external agencies.  holds sales expertise in sales closure by way of logical & trusted sales pitch, driving and leading the design meetings with the customers  holds behavioural attributes of result oriented, team work, integrity & ethics, crisp & meaningful communication.  holds a high degree of willingness to learn, ability to drive performance among independent team members.

job_description: the human resource head is accountable for supporting the human resource needs of their assigned branches, employee relations, employee engagement, policy and legal compliance, performance management, compensation, benefits, payroll processing, and employee and management coaching.    accountability & essential functions   builds effective business partnerships with management. develops and/or recommends human resources solutions that balance employee needs with departmental and overall company goals.  ensures payroll for assigned branches is processed accurately and timely, including time off, deductions, proration, and any other adjustments (does not include tax processing).  liaise with external vendors for companys compensation and benefits, training, or other related hr activities including but not limited to employee insurance company, government departments, and recruitment agency etc.  ensures new hires, terminations and changes are processed accurately and timely.  successfully manages and resolves complex employee relations and performance issues by conducting detailed investigations, creating and maintaining appropriate processes and documentation, organizing information and making recommendations regarding course of action.  ensure various hr processes and policies are complied.  conducts periodic audits to ensure compliance, maintains hr records in compliance with applicable internal and legal requirements.  supports regional and corporate hr management with administration of various projects and policy/procedure implementation and changes. manages special projects.  skills & certifications  high level of interpersonal skills and conflict management to handle sensitive and confidential situations and documentation  customer oriented, professional interaction with stakeholders  excellent written and verbal communication skills in local/official languages and english.  exhibits strong analytical and organizational skills.  self-motivated and integrity.  good team player with supervision skills is a plus  sound judgment, demonstrates problem solving abilities, decisiveness and flexibility.  strong time management and prioritization skills  open to changes and able to drive and manage changes  knowledge of hr practices, sop, policy and local regulations and compliance.  proficient in ms office (word, excel, powerpoint, and outlook)  working in mnc environment or experience as a hrbp role for asia countries will be an advantage.  knowledge of local labor laws is must.

job_description: position overview   job title â€“  operations manager   location â€“ jaipur, india   role description:  the operations manager is typically the owner of a department made up of several teams, mainly responsible for oversight and management of those groups and has an expert or deep understanding of the business, process and/or product. their main responsibilities include providing input into the creation of the bankâ€™s strategic goals and being an ultimate driver of the direction and performance to target. they are also responsible for driving transformation and continuous improvement, leading programmes or projects. they also manage and foster relationships with various stakeholders and/or vendors. they create robust management and team structures through rigorous recruitment & people development initiatives, ensuring the team is positioned well to execute a high standard of delivery and results within a controlled environment.  the operations manager is also responsible as an escalation point for department, controls, key process and risk indicators. they have accountability for budgets, vendor relationship and cost management. they lead by example in supporting the bankwide regulatory agenda, being proactive in the recognition and management of risk, leading or sponsoring change programmes.  the operation manager is also ultimately responsible for the performance of teams, supervisors and individual contributors in that any operational and transactional processes under the teamsâ€™ remit are performed within agreed policies and procedures. they ensure that key process and risk indicators, controls, service level agreements and vendor management are adhered to and evidenced; this includes creating a strong culture of risk mitigation and management  operations provides support for all of deutsche bankâ€™s businesses to enable them to deliver transactions and processes to clients. our people work in established global financial centers such as london, new york, frankfurt and singapore, as well as specialist development and service centers in locations including bucharest, moscow, pune, dublin and cary. we process payments in excess of a trillion euros across the bankâ€™s platforms, support thousands of trading desks and enable millions of banking transactions, share trades and emails every day  a dynamic and diverse division, our objective is to make sure that all our services are executed in a timely and professional manner, that risk is minimized and that the client experience is positive. we are proud of the professionalism of our people, and the work they do. in return, we offer excellent career development opportunities to foster skills and talent.  in accordance with anti-money laundering requirements, banks, such as deutsche bank ag ("db"), are obliged to perform know-your-client (â€œkycâ€) reviews on all new clients they adopt. these checks and reviews are made in strict accordance with regulatory requirement and the bankâ€™s internal policies.  the project involves verification of the client data, performing due diligence checks on the clients, reviewing kyc documentation performing the risk assessment of the client, liaising with the business/compliance, advising on kyc requirements and signing off on new client adoptions.the reg & tax analyst role is an operations function where you will be involved in reviewing various regulatory documents related to clients to ensure that all the regulatory requirements are met and the bank is in compliance.   what weâ€™ll offer you  as part of our flexible scheme, here are just some of the benefits that youâ€™ll enjoy   best in class leave policy  gender neutral parental leaves  100% reimbursement under childcare assistance benefit (gender neutral)  sponsorship for industry relevant certifications and education  employee assistance program for you and your family members  comprehensive hospitalization insurance for you and your dependents  accident and term life insurance  complementary health screening for 35 yrs. and above     your key responsibilities:  responsible for verification of client data  perform due diligence of new and existing clients covering a wide range of different client types including; listed and regulated, small/medium/ large private and public companies as well as more complex structures such as; spvs, co-operatives, foundations and funds, governments, joint ventures, etc.  verifying kyc documentation of the clients to be adopted/reviewed  perform the risk assessment of the client to be adopted/reviewed  signing off on new client adoptions and periodic reviews  manage new client adoption or periodic review stream, to ensure that all requests are approved in accordance with regulatory requirements and the bankâ€™s internal policies  manage exception ensuring that all slaâ€™s defined with the business on timeliness and quality are adhered   your skills and experience  12-14 + years of work experience  3-4 years of relevant work experience (aml/kyc/compliance related) within corporate financial services industry, research/analytics role in other banks / kpos etc    understanding of control, compliance, investigation/chasing functions in banks   familiarity aml/kyc regulations and industry guidelines (fsa, jmlsg, 3rd eu money laundering directive, mifid)   ability to interpret regulatory guidelines and assessing risk scores and entity types   ability to interpreting alerts   ability to identifying trends and inconsistencies   understanding of end to end kyc process     how weâ€™ll support you   training and development to help you excel in your career  coaching and support from experts in your team  a culture of continuous learning to aid progression  a range of flexible benefits that you can tailor to suit your needs     about us and our teams  please visit our company website for further information:   https://www.db.com/company/company.htm  our values define the working environment we strive to create â€“ diverse, supportive and welcoming of different views. we embrace a culture reflecting a variety of perspectives, insights and backgrounds to drive innovation. we build talented and diverse teams to drive business results and encourage our people to develop to their full potential. talk to us about flexible work arrangements and other initiatives we offer.  we promote good working relationships and encourage high standards of conduct and work performance. we welcome applications from talented people from all cultures, countries, races, genders, sexual orientations, disabilities, beliefs and generations and are committed to providing a working environment free from harassment, discrimination and retaliation.  click here to find out more about diversity and inclusion at deutsche bank.

job_description: about the team    the controllership team is responsible right from recording and tracking of each financial level transactions to closure of books and reporting of financial transactions by preparing financial statements and accordingly providing commentary of financial outlook of the entity which broadly includes: a systematic and programmed monthly financial statement closure and reporting process, liasioning with statutory auditors for timely completion of statutory audit, coordination with stakeholders as a facilitator to the audit team for providing input required for audit procedure. to ensure books of accounts get audited as per defined timelines and compliances. quarterly limited review inline with the sebi (lodr) requirements. coordination with internal financial control auditors for timely closure of internal audit to work upon financial constraints and observations identified by the audit team and boosting financial level procedures and avoidance of control gaps. streamlining the financial reporting process of subsidiaries for efficiency and timely finalization of group financial statements. finalization of monthly mis pl within defined timelines, facilitating the bankers, due diligence team, lenders, investors by sharing the required information on time and reporting the requested details in a defined framework. facilitating the timely completion of all planned acquisitions with respect to financial activities, such as financial, legal and tax due diligence, valuation and coordination etc.     job responsibilities      developing & maintaining key kpis across inventory, stock reconciliation, inbound & outbound performance.  lead successful continuous improvement projects and adherence to sops to ensure effective operations.  hold weekly calls with ops teams to maintain and monitor scorecard/store health index for performance of inventory across regions.  reviewing and regular monitoring of wastage, liquidation, shortage of inventory and thereby implementing measures for controlling/reducing the same.  perform surprise stock counts, reconciliation of book stock vs physical stock and validating appropriate stock adjustments.  coordinate, manage and conclude on quarterly external stock audits.  coordinate, manage and conclude on tagging of fixed asset and physical verification.  working closely with supply chain team and operations team to ensure quality, sufficient & accurate inventory levels.  responsible to the management, monitoring & improvement of the stock levels across the business.  ensuring quantity wise stock reconciliation.  responsible for driving daily stock audits across cities and making necessary interventions.  manage pilferage and drive penalties in defaulting pods.       desired skills      ca/ pg â€“ commerce, with 3-5 + years in inventory management roles with excellent people management skills in fmcg environment.  detailed knowledge of inventory procedures.  demonstrated experience in identifying and implementing continuous improvement projects and tracking of the success.  excellent interpersonal, communication and leadership skills. inspection and audits of buildings & taking up with respective agencies for timely closure. he shall impart fire safety trainings to employees of ghial and stake holders, scrutiny & issue of work for issuing permits, walkthrough with space committee for fire safety recommendation and timely issue of noc.     to achieve acceptable level of fire safety as per the annual fire prevention plan by ensuring all airport buildings are provided with applicable fire protection and alarm system as per the norms.  he shall ensure that the periodic inspection and maintenance of fire extinguishers and act for noc compliance requirement.  hazard identification and fire safety audit report.  fire noc      to carry out fire investigation on the fire scenes as and when directed by fire prevention officer for determining the origin and cause of the fire/incident by correlating with various guidelines.   investigation report    fire prevention trainings (covering approx. 8000 + stakeholder airport community as per the schedule and to maintain the records.  % completion       key accountabilities     audits & inspections     to conduct joint audit of internal and external fire hydrants and ensure its serviceability  to execute discussions with the stake holders, building inspectors regarding the issues pertaining to fire safety etc. and deliver lecture on fire safety and fire prevention topics when required.  to manage the fire safety audits and fire safety hazard inspection of various rgia buildings and installations by upholding the telangana state fire service act. other acts, codes & standards relevant to fire safety and the examination of building plan for compliance with the applicable codes and standards. follow up for closures of fire safety audit reports.  nil observations in audit report     to uphold the timely issue of terminal work permit, hot work permit, confined space work permit, and take part in walkthrough for space clearance for the such as fire hazard inspection report, fire safety audit report, fire extinguisher serviceability status with defect report, building fire incident report, fafa & fire warden training report.  to
